title: 2 Easy Ways to Change Your Email Address on Facebook

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. It's a blue app with a white f . If you're not automatically logged in , enter your email address and password to do so now.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is in the lower-right corner (iOS) or top-right corner (Android).

steps.title: Tap Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings & privacy . This is below Help & support .

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap Accounts Center.
steps.content: Tap Accounts Center . You can find this at the very top.

steps.title: Tap Personal details.
steps.content: Tap Personal details . This is underneath the Account settings header.

steps.title: Tap Contact info.
steps.content: Tap Contact info . You'll see your current email address here.

steps.title: Tap Add new contact.
steps.content: Tap Add new contact . Before you can change your primary email address for Facebook, you'll need to add a new one. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Add email.
steps.content: Tap Add email . You can also choose to add a mobile phone number and hide it if necessary.

steps.title: Enter another email address and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter another email address and tap Next . Be sure to spell it correctly. If prompted, check the box next to your Facebook account underneath Choose accounts for this email .

steps.title: Enter the confirmation code.
steps.content: Enter the confirmation code. Check your previous email address for the code.

steps.title: Delete the old email address (optional).
steps.content: Delete the old email address (optional). If you want to set the new email as primary, you can delete the old email. Return to the Contact information page. You may need to tap the back arrow to do so. Tap the email you want to delete. Tap Delete email . Tap Delete . Enter your Facebook password if prompted.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com/.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com/ . If you aren't already logged into your account , enter your email address and password to do so now.

steps.title: Click your profile picture.
steps.content: Click your profile picture. A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Click Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Click Settings & privacy . This is below your name.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Click Account Center.
steps.content: Click Account Center . You can find this in the left panel, underneath the search bar.

steps.title: Click Personal details.
steps.content: Click Personal details . This is underneath the Account settings header.

steps.title: Click Contact info.
steps.content: Click Contact info . You'll see your current email here.

steps.title: Click Add new contact.
steps.content: Click Add new contact . Before you can change your primary email address for Facebook, you'll need to add a new one.

steps.title: Click Add email.
steps.content: Click Add email . You can also choose to add a mobile phone number.

steps.title: Enter another email address and click Next.
steps.content: Enter another email address and click Next . Be sure to spell it correctly. If prompted, check the box next to your Facebook account underneath Choose accounts for this email .

steps.title: Enter the confirmation code.
steps.content: Enter the confirmation code. Check your previous email address for the code.

steps.title: Delete the old email address (optional).
steps.content: Delete the old email address (optional). If you want to set the new email as primary, you can delete the old email. Return to the Contact information page. You may need to close the pop-up menu to do so. Click the email you want to delete. Click Delete email . Click Delete . Enter your Facebook password if prompted.
